title: [Gyldemar Forest, The Barrens]
description: Dead trees stand like ghostly skeletons, their branches waving like arms in the wind.  The deceased trees cast spindly shadows across the dry dirt.  Wind gusts send bits of dirt flying around in stinging sheets.

Dead trees stand like ghostly skeletons, their branches waving like arms in the wind.  The deceased trees cast spindly shadows across the dry dirt.  Wind gusts send bits of dirt flying around in stinging sheets as unsuspected attacks in the night.
